class: center, middle

# `bind_rows()` and `bind_cols()`

---
# The `happy` data frame

.center[
```{r echo = FALSE}
happy %>% 
  kbl %>% 
  kable_styling()
```
]
---
# Split `happy` by row

```{r echo = TRUE}
happy_row_one <- happy %>% 
                  slice(1:2)
happy_row_two <- happy %>% 
                  slice(3:5)
```
--
`happy_row_one`  
```{r echo = FALSE}
happy_row_one
```
--
`happy_row_two`
```{r echo = FALSE}
happy_row_two
```
---
# Recreate `happy` using `bind_rows()`

.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
bind_rows(happy_row_one, happy_row_two)
```
]
---
# Order matters!

.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
bind_rows(happy_row_two, happy_row_one)
```
]
---
# Keep track of original data frames

.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
bind_rows(happy_row_one, happy_row_two, .id = "original_df")
```
]
---
# `bind_rows()` with unequal columns

.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
happy_row_two_cut <- happy_row_two %>% 
                      select(!social_support)
happy_row_two_cut
```
]
---
# `bind_rows()` with unequal columns

.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
bind_rows(happy_row_one, happy_row_two_cut)
```
]
---
# Split `happy` by column

```{r echo = TRUE}
happy_col_one <- happy %>% 
                  select(1:2)
happy_col_two <- happy %>% 
                  select(3:4)
```
--
.pull-left[
`happy_col_one`  
```{r echo = FALSE}
happy_col_one
```
]
--
.pull-right[
`happy_col_two`
```{r echo = FALSE}
happy_col_two
```
]
---
# Recreate `happy` using `bind_cols()`

.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
bind_cols(happy_col_one, happy_col_two)
```
]
---
# `bind_cols()` with unequal rows

.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
happy_col_two_cut <- happy_col_two %>% 
                        slice(1:4)
happy_col_two_cut
```
]
---
# `bind_cols()` with unequal rows

```{r echo = TRUE, eval = FALSE}
bind_cols(happy_col_one, happy_col_two_cut)
```

`Error in `bind_cols()`:`  
`! Can't recycle `..1` (size 5) to match `..2` (size 4).`
